text: The 1961 Oregon Webfoots football team represented the University of Oregon as an independent during the 1961 NCAA University Division football season. In their 11th season under head coach Len Casanova, the Webfoots compiled a 4–6 record and outscored their opponents, 152 to 112. The team played its home games at Hayward Field in Eugene, Oregon. The team's statistical leaders included Doug Post with 662 passing yards, Mel Renfro with 335 rushing yards, and Paul Burleson with 222 receiving yards. ==Schedule== ==Roster== *HB Mel Renfro, Soph. ==References== Oregon Category:Oregon Ducks football seasons Oregon Ducks football
title: 1961 Oregon Webfoots football team
